description:
The body validation is redundant for rebuild, should remove the redundant KeyError for 'rebuild'.
 In fact that this extension is registered as WSGI action implies that the body must contain a key with the same name as action.
title: Redundant validation for rebuild

comments.content:
The body validation is redundant for rebuild, should remove the redundant KeyError for 'rebuild'.
 In fact that this extension is registered as WSGI action implies that the body must contain a key with the same name as action.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhangyanzi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/58452

comments.content: Patch was abandoned after failing to pass unit tests.
